org.bluez
Class BlueZAPIFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.bluez.BlueZAPIFactory

public abstract class BlueZAPIFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Abstraction interface factory to access BlueZ over D-Bus Detect BlueZ D-Bus interface version and creates appropriate abstraction layer for JSR-82 implementation.
